attributes.action: recognise the disfigurement, pain, embarrassment, distress and ignorance endured by sufferers of both primary and secondary Lymphoedema
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Recognise the disfigurement, pain, embarrassment, distress and ignorance endured by sufferers of both primary and secondary Lymphoedema (believed to be more than 100,000 in the UK) by committing funds directly to:

a)	The long term treatment of patients with this debilitating condition.

b)	Educating all levels of health care professionals on every aspect of lymphoedema management including recognition, contraindications and treatment.

c)	Research into improved treatments and, ultimately, a cure.
